code.name: APC_INDEX_MISMATCH
code.description: Indicates that there is a mismatch in the APC state index.
code.p1: The address of the system call.
code.p2: The value of the following: Thread->ApcStateIndex << 8 | Previous ApcStateIndex
code.p4: The value of the previous KernelApcDisable

code.name: IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL
code.description: Indicates that kernel-mode code accessed paged memory at DISPATCH_LEVEL or above.
